ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] 49th Song Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: I asked about this at E3 - GZ gave me some kind of corporate line about only clerics, yada yada yada. I reminded him more than clerics could - then he fell
ygData.messageBody:
I asked about this at E3 - GZ gave me some kind of corporate line about
only clerics, yada yada yada. I reminded him more than clerics could - then
he fell back to the 'we are a hybrid' excuse.




At 07:22 PM 6/2/00 GMT, you wrote:
>Hail All,
>
>Why don't we ask for a very simple song for 49? Unvis Undead, nothing fancy,
>just plain old invis undead. It can't be twisted with anything, subjecst to
>song range, etc, just like all our songs. I understand (sorta) why our invis
>song had this component taken out, but now invis undead is about the only
>thing we Can't do.
